com.darylteo.nio

Class AbstractDirectoryWatchService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.darylteo.nio.AbstractDirectoryWatchService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryWatchService, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PollingDirectoryWatchService, ThreadPoolDirectoryWatchService

    public abstract class AbstractDirectoryWatchService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, DirectoryWatchService

    Each implementation of DirectoryWatchService is responsible for creating instances of DirectoryWatcher for you.

    Every DirectoryWatcher that is created by this Factory will use the same WatchService to receive file system events. If this is not desirable, instantiate a separate DirectoryWatcherFactory.

    All created DirectoryWatcher instances can be easily cleaned up by calling close() on this Factory as it implements the AutoCloseable interface. You should do this in any cleanup process done by your application.

    See Also:
    DirectoryWatcher
